title: Résumé for Research
text:
Note



This format emphasises contributions and impact, rather than job titles or publication counts. Evidence is linked where possible.
This Résumé for Research follows a narrative CV format commonly used by research funders. Contributions are organised into four modules.
Each entry should clearly state what you contributed, why it matters, and where the evidence can be found.

title: Home

Note




This site is a living portfolio: a curated record of projects, outputs, and a narrative CV with linked evidence.

title: Home
text:
